Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.exceptions

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BuildBeforeMoveException
    Specialized Exception to notify when a Player tries to make a Construction before making a Movement
    DeniedMoveException
    Specialized Exception to notify when a move is not allowed.
    LoseException
    Specialized Exception to notify when a Player loses.
    OutOfBoardException
    Specific Exception that is thrown when a player is trying to do anything outside of the board.
    RunOutMovesException
    Specialized Exception to notify when a Player runs out of moves for a specific State.
    TurnOverException
    Specialized Exception to notify when a Player's Turn is over.
    TurnSwitchedException
    Specialized Exception to notify when a Player's Turn needs to be switched.
    WinException
    Specialized Exception to notify when a Player wins, and thus to stop the game.
    WrongWorkerException
    Specialized Exception to notify when a Player wants to make a Move with a Worker he/she has not chosen at the Turn's start.
